description: Test suite for PDFBytesKnowledgeBase integration, involving reading a PDF file, creating a knowledge base, and testing both synchronous and asynchronous methods of the knowledge base and agent interactions.

classes.name: LanceDb
classes.description: External vector database class used for storing and retrieving PDF byte data.

classes.name: PDFBytesKnowledgeBase
classes.description: Knowledge base class that handles PDF data stored as bytes.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Agent class that interacts with the knowledge base to process queries.

methods.name: test_pdf_knowledge_base
methods.description: Synchronous test function that creates a knowledge base from a PDF, runs an agent query, and verifies the results.

methods.name: test_pdf_knowledge_base_async
methods.description: Asynchronous test function that performs similar operations as the synchronous test but using async methods.
